QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cast(pat.medrec_key as bigint) as medrec_key, v.pat_key, replace(replace(replace(lab_test_result, chr(9), ' '), chr(10), ' '), chr(13), ' ') as value_source_value, case when numeric_value_operator = '>' then 4172704 when numeric_value_operator = '=>' then 4171755 when numeric_value_operator = '<=' then 4171754 when numeric_value_operator = '<' then 4171756 when numeric_value_operator is null or numeric_value_operator = '' or numeric_value_operator = ' ' then null else 0 end as operator_concept_id, lab_test_loinc_code, case when charindex('(', lab_test) > 0 then substring(lab_test, 0, charindex('(', lab_test) - 1) else lab_test end snomed, observation_datetime, lab_test_result_unit, test_result_numeric_value, pat.adm_phy, case when lab_test_loinc_code is null or lab_test_loinc_code = '' then 0 else 1 end as isloinc, ch.PartitionId from {sc}.pat pat JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND pat.medrec_key = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE join {sc}.vitals v on pat.pat_key = v.pat_key order by ch.PartitionId, 1
